name.th: จ้างผู้เชี่ยวชาญ

content.th: การสนับสนุนฟรี

content.cs: Získejte bezplatnou pomoc zveřejněním své žádosti na fóru s tématem Plak [Pošlete svůj dotaz] (https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.da: Få gratis assistance ved at sende din anmodning på Plak Theme forum [Stil dit spørgsmål] (https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.de: Erhalten Sie kostenlose Unterstützung, indem Sie Ihre Anfrage im Plak Theme-Forum posten [Post Your Question](https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.en: Get Free assistance by posting your request on Plak Theme forum [Post Your Question](https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.es: Obtenga asistencia gratuita publicando su solicitud en el foro de Plak Theme [Publique su pregunta] (https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.fi: Saat ilmaista apua lähettämällä pyyntösi Plak -teemafoorumille [Lähetä kysymyksesi] (https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.fr: Obtenez une assistance gratuite en publiant votre demande sur le forum Plak Theme [Post Your Question] (https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.it: Ottieni assistenza gratuita pubblicando la tua richiesta sul forum del tema Plak [Pubblica la tua domanda] (https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.ja: Plakテーマフォーラムにリクエストを投稿して無料のサポートを受けましょう[質問を投稿]（https://plaktheme.com/community）
content.ko: Plak Theme 포럼 [Post Your Question](https://plaktheme.com/community)에 요청을 게시하여 무료 지원을 받으세요.
content.nb: Få gratis assistanse ved å legge ut forespørselen din på Plak Theme forum [Post Your Question] (https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.nl: Krijg gratis hulp door uw verzoek te plaatsen op het Plak Theme-forum [Plaats uw vraag](https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.pl: Uzyskaj bezpłatną pomoc, publikując swoją prośbę na forum tematycznym Plak [Opublikuj swoje pytanie] (https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.pt-BR: Obtenha assistência gratuita postando sua solicitação no fórum do tema Plak [Post Your Question] (https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.pt-PT: Obtenha assistência gratuita postando sua solicitação no fórum do tema Plak [Post Your Question] (https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.sv: Få gratis hjälp genom att lägga upp din förfrågan på Plak Theme forum [Skicka din fråga] (https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.th: รับความช่วยเหลือฟรีโดยโพสต์คำขอของคุณในฟอรัม Plak Theme [โพสต์คำถามของคุณ](https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.tr: İsteğinizi Plak Tema forumunda [Sorunuzu Gönderin](https://plaktheme.com/community) göndererek Ücretsiz yardım alın
content.vi: Nhận hỗ trợ miễn phí bằng cách đăng yêu cầu của bạn trên diễn đàn Chủ đề Plak [Đăng câu hỏi của bạn] (https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.zh-CN: 通过在 Plak 主题论坛上发布您的请求获得免费帮助 [发布您的问题](https://plaktheme.com/community)
content.zh-TW: 通過在 Plak 主題論壇上發布您的請求獲得免費幫助 [發布您的問題](https://plaktheme.com/community)

content.th: จ้างผู้เชี่ยวชาญ

content.cs: Najměte si Shopify Experta, který za vás upraví vaše téma, od drobných vylepšení až po hlavní úpravy. [Najměte si nyní] (https:  /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-tasks /)
content.da: Lej en Shopify -ekspert til at redigere dit tema for dig, fra små tweaks til større tilpasninger. [Lej nu] (https:  /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-tasks /)
content.de: Beauftragen Sie einen Shopify-Experten, um Ihr Design für Sie zu bearbeiten, von kleinen Optimierungen bis hin zu großen Anpassungen. [Jetzt einstellen] (https://plaktheme.com/plak-custom-tasks/)
content.en: Hire a Shopify Expert to edit your theme for you, from small tweaks to major customizations. [Hire now](https://plaktheme.com/plak-custom-tasks/)
content.es: Contrata a un experto en Shopify para que edite tu tema por ti, desde pequeños ajustes hasta personalizaciones importantes. [Contratar ahora] (https:  /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-tasks /)
content.fi: Palkkaa Shopify -asiantuntija muokataksesi teemaasi puolestasi pienistä muutoksista suuriin mukautuksiin. [Vuokraa nyt] (https:  /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-tasks /)
content.fr: Embauchez un expert Shopify pour modifier votre thème pour vous, des petits ajustements aux personnalisations majeures. [Recrutez maintenant] (https://plakteme.com/plak-custom-tasks/)
content.it: Assumi un esperto Shopify per modificare il tuo tema per te, dalle piccole modifiche alle personalizzazioni più importanti. [Noleggia ora] (https:  /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-tasks /)
content.ja: Shopifyエキスパートを雇って、小さな調整から主要なカスタマイズまで、テーマを編集してください。 [今すぐ雇う]（https： /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-tasks /）
content.ko: Shopify Expert를 고용하여 작은 조정부터 주요 사용자 정의까지 테마를 편집하세요. [지금 고용] (https:  /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-tasks /)
content.nb: Lei en Shopify -ekspert for å redigere temaet ditt for deg, fra små justeringer til store tilpasninger. [Lei nå] (https:  /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-tasks /)
content.nl: Huur een Shopify Expert in om je thema voor je te bewerken, van kleine aanpassingen tot grote aanpassingen. [Nu huren] (https:  /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-tasks /)
content.pl: Zatrudnij eksperta Shopify, aby edytować Twój motyw za Ciebie, od drobnych poprawek po duże dostosowania. [Zatrudnij teraz] (https:  /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-zadania /)
content.pt-BR: Contrate um especialista do Shopify para editar seu tema para você, desde pequenos ajustes até grandes personalizações. [Contrate agora] (https:  /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-tasks /)
content.pt-PT: Contrate um especialista do Shopify para editar seu tema para você, desde pequenos ajustes até grandes personalizações. [Contrate agora] (https:  /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-tasks /)
content.sv: Anlita en Shopify -expert för att redigera ditt tema åt dig, från små justeringar till stora anpassningar. [Hyr nu] (https: //plaktheme.com /plak-custom-tasks/)
content.th: จ้างผู้เชี่ยวชาญของ Shopify เพื่อแก้ไขธีมของคุณ ตั้งแต่การปรับแต่งเล็กน้อยไปจนถึงการปรับแต่งที่สำคัญ [จ้างเลย](https://plaktheme.com/plak-custom-tasks/)
content.tr: Küçük ince ayarlardan büyük özelleştirmelere kadar temanızı sizin için düzenlemesi için bir Shopify Uzmanı ile anlaşın. [Şimdi işe alın](https://plaktheme.com/plak-custom-tasks/)
content.vi: Thuê Chuyên gia Shopify để chỉnh sửa chủ đề cho bạn, từ những chỉnh sửa nhỏ đến những tùy chỉnh lớn. [Thuê ngay] (https:  /  / plaktheme.com  / plak-custom-task /)
content.zh-CN: 聘请 Shopify 专家为您编辑您的主题，从小的调整到主要的自定义。 [立即招聘](https://plaktheme.com/plak-custom-tasks/)
content.zh-TW: 聘請 Shopify 專家為您編輯您的主題，從小的調整到主要的自定義。 [立即招聘](https://plaktheme.com/plak-custom-tasks/)

name.th: รหัสใบอนุญาต

label.it: Inserisci la tua chiave di licenza
label.ja: ライセンスキーを入力してください
label.th: ป้อนรหัสใบอนุญาตของคุณ
label.vi: Nhập khóa cấp phép của bạn

content.cs: Abyste mohli legálně používat téma Plak a vyhnout se pozastavení účtu ze Shopify, zadejte nad licenční klíč a klikněte na „uložit“ [Potřebujete pomoc?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.da: For lovligt at bruge Plak Theme og undgå kontosuspension fra Shopify skal du indtaste over din licensnøgle og klikke på 'gem' [Brug for hjælp?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.de: Um Plak Theme legal zu verwenden und eine Kontosperrung von Shopify zu vermeiden, geben Sie über Ihrem Lizenzschlüssel ein und klicken Sie auf 'Speichern' [Hulp nodig?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.en: In order to legally use Plak Theme and avoid account suspension from Shopify, enter above your licence key and click 'save' [Need help?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.es: Para usar Plak Theme legalmente y evitar la suspensión de la cuenta de Shopify, ingrese arriba su clave de licencia y haga clic en 'guardar' [Necesitas ayuda?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.fi: Jos haluat käyttää Plak -teemaa laillisesti ja välttää Shopifyn tilin jäädyttämisen, kirjoita lisenssiavaimesi yläpuolelle ja napsauta Tallenna [Tarvitsetko apua?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.fr: Afin d'utiliser légalement Plak Theme et d'éviter la suspension de votre compte Shopify, entrez dessus votre clé de licence et cliquez sur 'sauvegarder' [Besoin d'aide?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.ja: Plakテーマを合法的に使用し、Shopifyからのアカウントの停止を回避するには、ライセンスキーの上に入力し、[保存]をクリックします[ヘルプが必要ですか？](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.ko: Plak 테마를 합법적으로 사용하고 Shopify에서 계정 정지를 방지하려면 라이센스 키 위에 입력하고 '저장'을 클릭합니다. [도움이 필요하십니까?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.nb: For å lovlig bruke Plak Theme og unngå kontosuspensjon fra Shopify, skriv inn over lisensnøkkelen din og klikk 'lagre' [Trenger du hjelp?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.nl: Om Plak Theme legaal te gebruiken en accountopschorting van Shopify te voorkomen, voert u boven uw licentiesleutel in en klikt u op 'opslaan' [Hulp nodig?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.pl: Aby legalnie korzystać z motywu Plak i uniknąć zawieszenia konta w Shopify, wprowadź powyżej swój klucz licencyjny i kliknij „zapisz” [Potrzebujesz pomocy?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.pt-BR: Para usar legalmente o Plak Theme e evitar a suspensão da conta do Shopify, insira acima sua chave de licença e clique em 'salvar' [Precisa de ajuda?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.pt-PT: Para usar legalmente o Plak Theme e evitar a suspensão da conta do Shopify, insira acima sua chave de licença e clique em 'salvar' [Precisa de ajuda?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.sv: För att lagligt använda Plak Theme och undvika kontosuspension från Shopify, ange ovanför din licensnyckel och klicka på 'spara' [Behöver du hjälp?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.th: หากต้องการใช้ Plak Theme อย่างถูกกฎหมายและหลีกเลี่ยงการระงับบัญชีจาก Shopify ให้ป้อนคีย์ใบอนุญาตที่ด้านบน แล้วคลิก 'บันทึก' [หากต้องการความช่วยเหลือ?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.tr: Plak Temasını yasal olarak kullanmak ve Shopify'dan hesabınızın askıya alınmasını önlemek için lisans anahtarınızın yukarısına girin ve 'kaydet'i tıklayın [Yardıma mı ihtiyacınız var?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.vi: Để sử dụng Chủ đề Plak một cách hợp pháp và tránh bị tạm ngưng tài khoản từ Shopify, hãy nhập phía trên khóa cấp phép của bạn và nhấp vào 'lưu' [Cần trợ giúp?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.zh-CN: 为了合法使用 Plak 主题并避免从 Shopify 暂停帐户，请在您的许可证密钥上方输入并单击“保存”[需要帮助？](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)
content.zh-TW: 為了合法使用 Plak 主題並避免從 Shopify 暫停帳戶，請在您的許可證密鑰上方輸入並單擊“保存”[需要幫助？](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/enable-sales-products-popup/)

info.cs: Zobrazí se při sdílení odkazu na sociálních médiích. [Další informace]
info.da: Vises ved deling af et link på sociale medier. [Lær mere]
info.de: Wird gezeigt, wenn ein Link sozial geteilt wird. [Mehr erfahren](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/social-sharing-image-and-text/)
info.en: Shown when sharing a link on social media. [Learn more](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/social-sharing-image-and-text/) about image thumbnails.
info.es: Aparece cuando se comparte un enlace en una red social. [Más información](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/social-sharing-image-and-text/) acerca de las miniaturas

name.th: แปลงสกุลเงิน

content.cs: Můžete změnit způsob zobrazování měn ve vašem obchodě, abyste zákazníkům usnadnili čtení částek. [Potřebovat pomoc?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.da: Du kan ændre den måde, hvorpå valutaer vises i din butik for at gøre det lettere for dine kunder at læse beløbene. [Brug for hjælp?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.de: Sie können die Art und Weise ändern, in der Währungen in Ihrem Geschäft angezeigt werden, um Ihren Kunden das Lesen der Beträge zu erleichtern. [Brauche Hilfe?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.en: You can change the way that currencies are shown on your store to make it easier for your customers to read the amounts. [Need help?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.es: Puede cambiar la forma en que se muestran las monedas en su tienda para facilitar a sus clientes la lectura de los importes. [Necesidad de ayuda?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.fi: Voit muuttaa tapaa, jolla valuutat näkyvät kaupassasi, jotta asiakkaidesi on helpompi lukea summia. [Tarvitsetko apua?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.fr: Vous pouvez modifier la façon dont les devises sont affichées sur votre boutique pour faciliter la lecture des montants par vos clients. [Besoin d'aide?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.it: Puoi modificare il modo in cui le valute vengono mostrate nel tuo negozio per facilitare la lettura degli importi da parte dei tuoi clienti. [Ho bisogno di aiuto?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.ja: ストアでの通貨の表示方法を変更して、顧客が金額を読みやすくすることができます。 [助けが必要?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.ko: 고객이 금액을 더 쉽게 읽을 수 있도록 상점에 통화가 표시되는 방식을 변경할 수 있습니다. [도움이 필요하다?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.nb: Du kan endre måten valutaer vises i butikken din for å gjøre det lettere for kundene å lese beløpene. [Trenger hjelp?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.nl: U kunt de manier wijzigen waarop valuta's in uw winkel worden weergegeven, zodat uw klanten de bedragen gemakkelijker kunnen lezen. [Hulp nodig?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.pl: Możesz zmienić sposób wyświetlania walut w Twoim sklepie, aby ułatwić klientom odczytanie kwot. [Potrzebuję pomocy?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.pt-BR: Você pode alterar a forma como as moedas são mostradas em sua loja para tornar mais fácil para seus clientes lerem os valores. [Preciso de ajuda?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.pt-PT: Você pode alterar a forma como as moedas são mostradas em sua loja para tornar mais fácil para seus clientes lerem os valores. [Preciso de ajuda?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.sv: Du kan ändra hur valutor visas i din butik för att göra det lättare för dina kunder att läsa beloppen. [Behövs hjälp?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.th: คุณสามารถเปลี่ยนวิธีการแสดงสกุลเงินในร้านค้าของคุณเพื่อให้ลูกค้าของคุณอ่านจำนวนเงินได้ง่ายขึ้น [ต้องการความช่วยเหลือ?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.tr: Müşterilerinizin tutarları okumasını kolaylaştırmak için para birimlerinin mağazanızda gösterilme şeklini değiştirebilirsiniz. [yardıma ihtiyacım var?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.vi: Bạn có thể thay đổi cách hiển thị đơn vị tiền tệ trên cửa hàng của mình để giúp khách hàng đọc số tiền dễ dàng hơn. [Cần giúp đỡ?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.zh-CN: 您可以更改货币在商店中的显示方式，以便客户更轻松地阅读金额。 [需要帮忙?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)
content.zh-TW: 您可以更改貨幣在商店中的顯示方式，以便客戶更輕鬆地閱讀金額。 [需要幫忙?](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)

label.cs: Automaticky převádějte měny v závislosti na IP návštěvníka
label.da: Konverter automatisk valutaer afhængigt af den besøgende IP
label.de: Währungen werden abhängig von der Besucher-IP automatisch konvertiert
label.en: Automatically convert currencies depending on the visitor IP
label.es: Convierta automáticamente monedas dependiendo de la IP del visitante
label.fi: Muunna valuutat automaattisesti vierailijan IP-osoitteesta riippuen
label.fr: Convertissez automatiquement les devises en fonction de l'adresse IP du visiteur
label.it: Converti automaticamente le valute a seconda dell'IP del visitatore
label.ja: 訪問者のIPに応じて通貨を自動的に変換します
label.ko: 방문자 IP에 따라 자동으로 통화 변환
label.nb: Konverter automatisk valutaer avhengig av besøkende IP
label.nl: Valuta's automatisch omrekenen, afhankelijk van het IP-adres van de bezoeker
label.pl: Automatycznie przeliczaj waluty w zależności od adresu IP odwiedzającego
label.pt-BR: Converter moedas automaticamente, dependendo do IP do visitante
label.pt-PT: Converter moedas automaticamente, dependendo do IP do visitante
label.sv: Konvertera automatiskt valutor beroende på besökarens IP
label.th: แปลงสกุลเงินโดยอัตโนมัติขึ้นอยู่กับ IP ของผู้เยี่ยมชม
label.tr: Ziyaretçi IP'sine bağlı olarak para birimlerini otomatik olarak dönüştürün
label.vi: Tự động chuyển đổi tiền tệ tùy thuộc vào IP của khách truy cập
label.zh-CN: 根据访问者 IP 自动转换货币
label.zh-TW: 根據訪問者 IP 自動轉換貨幣

label.ja: 通貨コンバーターを有効にする
label.th: เปิดใช้งานตัวแปลงสกุลเงิน
label.vi: Bật công cụ chuyển đổi tiền tệ

info.cs: I když jsou ceny zobrazeny v jiné měně, objednávky budou stále zpracovány v měně vašeho obchodu.
info.da: Selvom priser vises i en anden valuta, behandles ordrer stadig i din butiks valuta.
info.de: Auch wenn die Preise in einer anderen Währung angezeigt werden, werden Bestellungen weiterhin in der Währung Ihres Geschäfts verarbeitet.
info.en: Even if prices are displayed in a different currency, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.
info.es: Incluso si los precios se muestran en una moneda diferente, los pedidos se procesarán en la moneda de su tienda.
info.fi: Vaikka hinnat näkyisivät eri valuutassa, tilaukset käsitellään silti kauppasi valuutassa.
info.fr: Même si les prix sont affichés dans une devise différente, les commandes seront toujours traitées dans la devise de votre magasin.
info.it: Anche se i prezzi vengono visualizzati in una valuta diversa, gli ordini verranno comunque elaborati nella valuta del tuo negozio.
info.ja: 価格が別の通貨で表示されている場合でも、注文はストアの通貨で処理されます。
info.ko: 가격이 다른 통화로 표시되더라도 주문은 여전히 ​​상점의 통화로 처리됩니다.
info.nb: Selv om prisene vises i en annen valuta, vil bestillinger fortsatt bli behandlet i butikkens valuta.
info.nl: Zelfs als prijzen in een andere valuta worden weergegeven, worden bestellingen nog steeds verwerkt in de valuta van uw winkel.
info.pl: Nawet jeśli ceny są wyświetlane w innej walucie, zamówienia nadal będą realizowane w walucie Twojego sklepu.
info.pt-BR: Mesmo que os preços sejam exibidos em uma moeda diferente, os pedidos ainda serão processados ​​na moeda de sua loja.
info.pt-PT: Mesmo que os preços sejam exibidos em uma moeda diferente, os pedidos ainda serão processados ​​na moeda de sua loja.
info.sv: Även om priserna visas i en annan valuta kommer beställningar fortfarande att behandlas i din butiks valuta.
info.th: แม้ว่าราคาจะแสดงเป็นสกุลเงินอื่น คำสั่งซื้อจะยังคงได้รับการประมวลผลในสกุลเงินของร้านค้าของคุณ
info.tr: Fiyatlar farklı bir para biriminde gösterilse bile, siparişler mağazanızın para biriminde işlenmeye devam edecektir.
info.vi: Ngay cả khi giá được hiển thị bằng đơn vị tiền tệ khác, đơn đặt hàng vẫn sẽ được xử lý bằng đơn vị tiền tệ của cửa hàng bạn.
info.zh-CN: 即使价格以不同的货币显示，订单仍将以您商店的货币处理。
info.zh-TW: 即使價格以不同的貨幣顯示，訂單仍將以您商店的貨幣處理。

label.th: ไม่มีรหัสประเทศ (€10.00)
พร้อมรหัสประเทศ (€10.00 EUR)
สกุลเงินที่จะแสดง
label.vi: Đơn vị tiền tệ để hiển thị

settings.default: USD EUR GBP CAD ARS AUD BBD BDT BSD BHD BRL BOB BND BGN ILS MMK KYD CLP CNY COP CRC HRK CZK DKK DOP XCD EGP XPF FJD GHS GTQ GYD GEL HKD HUF ISK INR IDR NIS JMD JPY JOD KZT KES KWD LVL LTL MXN MYR MUR MDL MAD MNT MZN ANG NZD NGN NOK OMR PKR PYG PEN PHP PLN QAR RON RUB SAR RSD SCR SGD SYP ZAR KRW LKR SEK CHF TWD THB TZS TTD TRY UAH AED UYU VEB VND ZMK

info.cs: Použijte ISO dané země [kód měny](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Oddělte své měnové kódy mezerou.
info.da: Brug landets ISO [valutakode](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Adskil dine valutakoder med et mellemrum.
info.de: Verwenden Sie die ISO des Landes [Währungscode](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Separate your currency codes with a space.
info.en: Use the country's ISO [currency code](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Separate your currency codes with a space.
info.es: Utiliza la ISO del país [código de moneda](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Separate your currency codes with a space.
info.fi: Käytä maan ISO-arvoa [valuutta koodi](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Erota valuuttakoodisi välilyönnillä.
info.fr: Utilisez l'ISO du pays [code devise](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Separate your currency codes with a space.
info.it: Usa l'ISO del paese [codice valuta](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Separa i tuoi codici valuta con uno spazio.
info.ja: 国のISOを使用する [通貨コード](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter)。通貨コードはスペースで区切ります。
info.ko: 해당 국가의 ISO 사용 [통화 코드](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). 통화 코드는 공백으로 구분하십시오.
info.nb: Bruk landets ISO [valutakode](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Skill valutakodene med et mellomrom.
info.nl: Gebruik de ISO van het land [valuta code](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Scheid uw valutacodes met een spatie.
info.pl: Użyj ISO kraju [kod waluty](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Oddziel kody walut spacją.
info.pt-BR: Use o ISO do país [Código da moeda](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Separe seus códigos de moeda com um espaço.
info.pt-PT: Use o ISO do país [Código da moeda](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Separe seus códigos de moeda com um espaço.
info.sv: Använd landets ISO [Valutakod](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Separera dina valutakoder med ett mellanslag.
info.th: ใช้ ISO . ของประเทศ [รหัสสกุลเงิน](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). แยกรหัสสกุลเงินของคุณด้วยการเว้นวรรค
info.tr: Ülkenin ISO'sunu kullanın [para birimi kodu](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Para birimi kodlarınızı bir boşlukla ayırın.
info.vi: Sử dụng ISO của quốc gia [Mã tiền tệ](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter). Phân tách các mã tiền tệ của bạn bằng một khoảng trắng.
info.zh-CN: 使用国家的 ISO [货币代码](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter).用空格分隔您的货币代码。
info.zh-TW: 使用國家的 ISO [貨幣代碼](https://plaktheme.com/knowledge-base/currency-converter).用空格分隔您的貨幣代碼。

label.th: สกุลเงินเริ่มต้น
